segments.text: I observe the kitchen from this angle, seeing the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down like a waterfall onto the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her dish, not even glancing at the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Piles of clean dishes sit nearby, safe for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy balances precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, pulling out goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches him, her arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting; it's going to give way soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is slippery from the spill; anyone could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks inviting and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how the inside chaos goes unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR
